tasks.task: Performing farming operations for lentil crop
subtasks: Preparing paddocks by cleaning stumps and rolling
Harvesting lentils using modern harvester with auto ground pressure monitoring
Adjusting harvester settings for lentil harvesting (open concave, slow rotor, similar fan speed to wheat)
Taking fire safety measures during harvesting (using thermal blankets)
Articulating the benefits of growing lentils over peas (e.g., higher price)
Exploring new lentil varieties (e.g., Hallmark, Highlands) with better herbicide tolerance and vigor
Discussing the importance of initial paddock setup for legume cultivation
Constructing a shed for lentil storage (2,000 tonnes capacity)
Tarping lentils for up to 6-7 months of storage
Utilizing auto-on-ground pressure monitoring in headers
Adjusting for higher temperatures to prevent lentil cracking during harvest

tasks.task: Understanding GRDC support for lentil research
subtasks: Investigating improvements in lentil agronomy through GRDC projects
Highlighting promising new lentil varieties through GRDC initiatives
